Posts.Content: I also got a callback yesterday and I have such anxiety. The response from my husband when I told him I had anxiety was to "take a pill you f'in b*tch." So the support from home is less than desirable. The radiologist can't get me in for another week and I am constantly on the verge of tears.  I'm 35 with no family history of cancer. It is still unsettling.
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared
Hi, Alyj, I'm copying your post into a new thread...
